caption.p: Structure of the IAV PA-X protein. ( A) Schematic diagram of PA-X showing functional domains. Residues within the shared N-terminal domain known to affect PA-X shutoff activity are shown in red. Blue stars indicate the location of residues involved in endonuclease activity as previously shown in Figure 1. ( B) Crystal structure of H3N2 PA N-terminal domain (PDB: 2W69) showing the location of key residues highlighted in (A) and the beginning of the X open reading frame (X-ORF) at Phe 191 [ 27].
